channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins OpenId Connect Authentication Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins OpenId Connect Authentication Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-24424|2023-10-24T12:48:12.723Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20openid%20connect%20authentication%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins OpenId Connect Authentication Plugin 2.4 and earlier does not invalidate the previous session on login.

item.title: CVE-2023-50770|2023-12-13T17:30:17.513Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20openid%20connect%20authentication%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins OpenId Connect Authentication Plugin 2.6 and earlier stores a password of a local user account used as an anti-lockout feature in a recoverable format, allowing attackers with access to the Jenkins controller file system to recover the plain text password of that account, likely gaining administrator access to Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2023-50771|2023-12-13T17:30:18.172Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20openid%20connect%20authentication%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins OpenId Connect Authentication Plugin 2.6 and earlier improperly determines that a redirect URL after login is legitimately pointing to Jenkins, allowing attackers to perform phishing attacks.
